abstract: Heiress, author and actress Gloria Vanderbilt and her son Anderson Cooper open up in documentary of her life entitled Nothing Left Unsaid and memoir two wrote together called The Rainbow Comes and Goes: A Mother and Son on Life, Love, and Loss.
lead_paragraph: Ms. Vanderbilt covers the familiar terrain of her colorful life in a new documentary and a memoir with her son Anderson Cooper.

headline.print_headline: Mother and Son: So Much More to Say

snippet: Ms. Vanderbilt covers the familiar terrain of her colorful life in a new documentary and a memoir with her son Anderson Cooper.
